content.rendered:
I would like to commend your organization, more specifically Bill Cutter for their excellent guidance and expertise during the recent valuation and sale of my funeral home.  I found myself on totally unfamiliar ground and their professionalism made the entire process as pleasant for me as it could have possibly been.  All of my questions were immediately answered and any concerns I had were addressed. I certainly would not hesitate to recommend your organization to any owner in my position. I truly appreciate the way Bill and staff handled all of our contacts. I could not have asked for more.

Hank Schmidt
Schmidt Funeral Home
Katy, TX
